trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound"></xref> events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemCreated"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapPath.ItemDataBound"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapNodeItem"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When you create a SiteMapNodeItemEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 SiteMapNodeItemEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关与委托一起处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
